attributes.action: immediately change the law so that people holding jobs in publicly funded organisations, like the NHS, are held personally liable for the payment of any compensation orders made as a result of unlawful actions by them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For far too long the taxpayer has been making life very easy for anybody on the public payroll who screws up or breaks the law.  They merely pass the bill on to the taxpayer.  This has to stop, it is a licence to act outside the law which our elected representatives are very happy to continue to ignore.  The taxpayer MUST be given an opportunity to voice an opinion on this immoral waste of their hard earned (but taken under threat of criminalisation) pounds.  This is NOT why we pay taxes.  We pay tatoxes to pay for services, not  pay fines or compensation orders imposed by our courts of law.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
